text: Ra junadina ti manisaharu, jasale inkara gare, narkako agadi prastuta garinechan, (bhaninecha) ‘‘ke yo satya ho'ina?’’ Uniharule bhannechanh ki hamro palanakartako kasama!’’ (Yo satya ho) usale bhannecha– ‘‘ta aba yatanako svada cakha, tyasa inkarako parinamasvarupa jo timiharule garne gardathyau.’’
